attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We've totally lost it 
Parliament and nearly everyone there has lost the thread

This damned European Court on Human Rights, will or has nearly finished Britain off...

We have Child protection, which we need obviously, bit it's all gone far too far

Stop the Yobs, bring back discipline, it was never like this years ago

never mind the culprits, let's defend the victims

prison sentences, are said not to work, is that so ...Tough, while they are locked up, people outside are safe

How much more do people have to put up with..

Mr Blair, came to power, i  voted for him, i believed in him, i wanted him to stop the Tories...

But he has brought this all on himself i'm afraid

Had he have stood firm, and said to the crime bods NO MORE, he could have been in power for i don't know how long

What a shame Britain has come to this 

And it'll get worse
